name: git-ai-committer
description: Automatically generates commit messages and commits changes using AI

gitAiCommitter.preferredAIProvider.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Recommended**: Use the command `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` for a better configuration experience.

Preferred AI provider for generating commit messages
gitAiCommitter.preferredAIProvider.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration
enumDescriptions: Use Editor Built-in AI (Copilot) for commit messages
Use Google Gemini for commit messages

gitAiCommitter.geminiApiKey.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

API Key for Google Gemini
gitAiCommitter.geminiApiKey.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.backupProvider1.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

First backup AI provider if primary fails
gitAiCommitter.backupProvider1.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.backupProvider2.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Second backup AI provider if primary and first backup fail
gitAiCommitter.backupProvider2.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.inactivityDelay.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Seconds to wait after stopping typing before checking for commits
gitAiCommitter.inactivityDelay.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.minCommitDelay.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Minimum seconds between actual commits (prevents rapid commits)
gitAiCommitter.minCommitDelay.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.ignoredFilePatterns.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

File patterns to ignore during auto commits (temp files, logs, etc.)
gitAiCommitter.ignoredFilePatterns.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.versionBumpingEnabled.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Enable/disable automatic version bumping on commits
gitAiCommitter.versionBumpingEnabled.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
